duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer inbound calls from prospective and current customers, addressing their inquiries and scheduling appointments.
Make outbound calls to potential customers, determining their interest and eliminating uninterested prospects.
Email current and potential customers to address their questions and schedule meetings with salespersons.
Maintain accurate records of interactions and customer interests.
Perform administrative duties such as copying, scanning, filing documents, and monitoring office supplies.
Keep the reception area tidy and observe professional etiquette.

education_certification.credential: Bilingual in English, Spanish, or Chinese
